content:
Hello. I created a commit in my branch locally in order to make a patch for cranelift but I met this:
"remote: Permission to bytecodealliance/wasmtime.git denied to antonromanov1.". Can I get the permission please ?
You will need to fork wasmtime to your own github account and then push your commit to this fork. Once you have done this you can open a PR.
(I moved this to a different topic for clarity)
Till Schneidereit has marked this topic as resolved.
